text: Leucozonia leucozonalis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== Cuba, Hispaniola, and Grand Cayman Island (Abbott, 1958) ==References== Abbott, R.T. 1958. The marine mollusks of Grand Cayman Island, British West Indies. Monographs of the Academy of Natural Sciences Philadelphia No. 11. ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1822
title: Leucozonia leucozonalis
